Weigh Scale Systems

Ravas

Integrating weighing and measuring technology, RAVAS manufactures and distributes solutions that enable you to weigh and measure your loads during transport.

Carrylift, in partnership with RAVAS, offer pallet trucks, weigh forks, warehouse trucks and hydraulic weighing systems. With a wide range of features and benefits, take a look at the products below to see which is right for you.

Additionally, for further information and help, feel free to get in touch here for advice and assistance from an experienced professional.

Pallet Trucks
RAVAS 1100

2,000kg capacity in 1kg graduation steps as standard. 6V Indicator powered by 4 x AA batteries. Maximum error: 0.1% of applied load.

RAVAS 2100L

2000kg capacity in 0.2kg/0.5kg/1.0kg graduation steps as standard. 12V rechargeable battery. Max. error: 0.1% of applied load.

RAVAS Ergo-Scissor Lift

1,000kg capacity in 0.5kg/1kg graduations as standard. 12V rechargeable batter. Max. error: 0.1% of applied load.

RAVAS Ergo-Truck

Mobile truck with electric drive with 1500kg capacity. Powered by 48V Li-ion battery. Max. error: 0.1% of applied load.

Weighforks & Warehouse Trucks
Loadcell system – RWV-C

A cabled fork scale. Cable fitted through the mast connecting the forks to the indicator in the cab. Max. error: 0.1% of load lifted. Power from truck battery.

Loadcell system – iForks-32

Safecheck A cable free system, with Bluetooth connection between forks and indicator. Max. error: 0.1% of load lifted. Mobile device ‘app’ also available

Pallet Truck Conversions – RPW-EL

Retro-fit option. Increases fork height by 5mm. Multirange 0.5kg/1kg graduations as standard. Max. error: 0.1% of applied load. Power supplied via truck battery.

Stacker conversions – RPW-ST

Retro-fit option. Increases fork height by 5mm. Multirange 0.5kg/1kg graduations as standard. Max. error: 0.1% of applied load. Power supplied via truck battery

Hydraulic Weighing Systems
RCS Load Indicator

Hydraulic load indicator system. On a lift truck with capacity 2500kg, the weight graduation is displayed in steps of 10kg with a +/- 50kg tolerance.

Safecheck

Hydraulic load indicator system with overload indication. On a lift truck with capacity 2500kg, the weight graduation is displayed in steps of 10kg with a +/- 50kg tolerance.

Safeload

Dynamic load/overload protection system to aid prevention of FLT tipping. On a truck with capacity 2500kg, weight graduations are displayed in 10kg steps with a +/- 50kg tolerance. Data logging options as standard

Hy-Q-52

Accurate hydraulic weighing system with overload indication. On a 2500kg capacity truck, weight graduations are displayed in 2kg steps with a +/- 5kg tolerance. Bluetooth as standard.

Enquire Now:
